about_the_game:
In this demo, you'll play as Dinocop as he arrives at the Cretaceous Hotel, where he's tasked with solving a mysterious, meaty case. You'll begin your investigation by interrogating various dinosaurs and inspecting the kiosks at the Dinosaur Rights Convention.

Humans had the silly idea of bringing dinosaurs back to life, and ever since, relationships between the two species have been strained. You were created in a laboratory to become the only dinosaur cop. Every day, you ask yourself: are you making the world better for your dino peers, or are you just a tool of human propaganda? The meaty case you'll face today might help you answer your most profound existential dilemma.

Features:

  • A rich and funny story starring a cast of anthropomorphic dinosaurs faced with sociopolitical and personal issues

  • A puzzling case set in a day cycle. Uncover secrets scattered through time.

    If you encounter any bugs, please don’t hesitate to report them on our Discord.

content_descriptors.notes: The mature content in this demo primarily consists of cartoon violence. Dialogues include swearing and cursing.

name: Dinocop Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Processor: Intel CPU Core i3
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 460

dejus.descriptors:
Drogas ilícitas
Linguagem imprópria
Atos criminosos

reviews:
“It’s a lot of fun and the game does a great job of backing up its novelty premise with engaging gameplay, interesting characters and lots of great gags. Highly recommended.”
Alpha Beta Gamer

“What follows is an exploration of ideas, with a strong comedic bent [...] It’s charming, sharply written, and [...] is brimming full of potential and promises to be a lot of fun. (10 Steam Next Fest Games You Should Try)”
TechRaptor

“Dinocop’s demo left me hungry for more, much like a T-Rex eyeing a turkey leg. It’s a charming introduction to what promises to be a dino-sized detective saga, filled with humor, quirky characters, and the thrill of cracking prehistoric cases.”
Fatality Gaming Magazine
short_description: In a world where dinosaurs and humans live side by side, you're the one and only Dinocop. And you got a meaty case to crack. In this mystery game set in a day cycle, uncover secrets scattered through time.
